pullRequest.title: Tool for arrays QC metrics calculations
pullRequest.bodyText: Pulls down a temp table of genotype counts, calculates excess het and call rate and writes them to a tsv for future upload.

commit.message: Tool for arrays qc metrics calculations

nodes.bodyText: Turns out that it's MUCH faster to use the storage API here (like 10-20 times) since you're pulling out the entire table.  You can see what I do for this in the ArrayExtractCohort for probe_info
Do you want to format these to any kind of fixed precision?  I know some of the GATK tools go to 3 decimal places.  Same fo all the doubles
same for other types.   If they can be null, use the object (Double) and be sure to handle the null case when you use them.  if not use the primitive (double) and you don't have to worry!
